title: A Girl Like Moi
description: After maxing-out her credit card, boarding school student Imogene gets an internship at a forecasting agency in New York and gets more than just a little side cash when suddenly she becomes the "it" girl of the fashion industry with front-row seats at all the shows, a Vespa to get around town, and the phone numbers of all the hottest divas in town! Original.
author: Lisa Barham
